physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Leukocytosis of 20,000 white cells/mm3; pleural fluid white cell count of 6,830/mm3; exubberant reactive tissue within the bronchus intermedius causing obstruction.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Initially asymptomatic until the onset of pleuritic chest pain which developed secondary to postobstructive pneumonia and empyema due to chronic airway occlusion.
